verses.roman:
ei-mata premāveśe rātri goṅāilā
prātaḥ-kāle nija-nija-kārye duṅhe gelā

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love of Godhead; rātri—the night; goṅāilā—passed; prātaḥ-kāle—in the morning; nija-nija-kārye—to their own respective duties; duṅhe—both of them; gelā—departed.
translation: The entire night was passed in this way, in ecstatic love of Godhead. In the morning they both departed to tend to their respective duties.
